Text: BEAUTIFUL!  Totally by chance I ran into this torrent!  And in flac too!!!  Score!!!!!   Many thanks, yanek!
I don't get FLAC. Do people just not know how to rip into the format, or is it always of lower quality than 320Mb/s MP3?
Unfortunately some albums are lower quality than loosless 320kb/s mp3 files... for example Standing in the way of control album.
